messages.subject: a request for a friend, new to this :)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, all! I have a friend in Canada, who is really interested in unschooling. Her kids are in school now, but she is done with the BS and is ready to try
messages.messageBody:
Hi, all! I have a friend in Canada, who is really interested in unschooling.
Her kids are in school now, but she is done with the BS and is ready to try
alternative methods. I am not sure how unschooly she will become, or wants to
become, but I know she is very interested and has ordered The Teenage Liberation
Handbook :) I asked her if I could help her find anyone near her - she has
joined up with some Canadian yahoo groups for homeschooling, but is also
interested in knowing some people in person that unschool. Here is her info:

We live in Gatineau, Quebec,Â which is 2 minutes from the bridge into downtown
Ottawa, Ontario.

If anyone knows anyone around tha area, that might be willing to meet up, or
could tell her of any unschooling in that area, that'd be great. Thanks in
advance!

Karen
